name: erthi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)), wbr(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cec(c0, c1), cec(c2, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c0, c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wer(c1, c3))

comment: Basic property of equivalence relations. Part of Lemma 3N of [Enderton] p. 57. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jul-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
